channel.title: CVE Feed for NI -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NI -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5136|2023-11-08T15:24:10.867Z -- ni -- topografix%20dataplugin%20for%20gpx
item.description: An incorrect permission assignment in the TopoGrafix DataPlugin for GPX could result in information disclosure. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by getting a user to open a specially crafted data file.

item.title: CVE-2023-4601|2023-10-18T19:15:33.759Z -- ni -- system%20configuration
item.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in NI System Configuration that could result in information disclosure and/or arbitrary code execution. Successful exploitation requires that an attacker can provide a specially crafted response. This affects NI System Configuration 2023 Q3 and all previous versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-4570|2023-10-05T15:26:45.467Z -- ni -- measurementlink
item.description: An improper access restriction in NI MeasurementLink Python services could allow an attacker on an adjacent network to reach services exposed on localhost. These services were previously thought to be unreachable outside of the node. This affects measurement plug-ins written in Python using version 1.1.0 of the ni-measurementlink-serviceÂ Python package and all previous versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-1156|2024-02-20T14:37:07.095Z -- ni -- systemlink%20server
item.description: Incorrect directory permissions for the shared NI RabbitMQ service may allow a local authenticated user to read RabbitMQ configuration information and potentially enable escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-1155|2024-02-20T14:34:08.556Z -- ni -- systemlink%20server
item.description: Incorrect permissions in the installation directories for shared SystemLink Elixir based services may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-4044|2024-06-04T17:54:22.689Z -- ni -- flexlogger
item.description: A deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability exists in common code used by FlexLogger and InstrumentStudio that may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to get a user to open a specially crafted project file. This vulnerability affects NI FlexLogger 2024 Q1 and prior versions as well as NI InstrumentStudio 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-23609|2024-03-11T15:17:59.351Z -- ni -- labview
item.description: An improper error handling vulnerability in LabVIEW may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted VI. This vulnerability affects LabVIEW 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-23612|2024-03-11T15:19:34.788Z -- ni -- labview
item.description: An improper error handling vulnerability in LabVIEW may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted VI. This vulnerability affects LabVIEW 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-23608|2024-03-11T15:10:16.963Z -- ni -- labview
item.description: An out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check in LabVIEW may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted VI. This vulnerability affects LabVIEW 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-23611|2024-03-11T15:14:22.944Z -- ni -- labview
item.description: An out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check in LabVIEW may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted VI. This vulnerability affects LabVIEW 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-23610|2024-03-11T15:12:33.108Z -- ni -- labview
item.description: An out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check in LabVIEW may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted VI. This vulnerability affects LabVIEW 2024 Q1 and prior versions.
